title: Real talk: If you spend money on this game you DESERVE to get ripped off.
body:
\>spending money on a FREE game for things that you don't actually own by contract

You get mad at getting "ripped off" yet you're already shoveling money into a furnace

All these people complaining about PAX Sivir or whatever.

"muh limited and rare cometic skin"
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t0I3Ihd351w
